settings.text: We have multiple payment plan options available: KLARNA, AFFIRM, AFTERPAY and Layaway. Each option has unique features and benefits that can help you purchase your dream designer piece today without breaking the bank.

settings.title: AFTERPAY allows you to shop now and pay later. Your purchase will be split into 4 payments, payable every 2 weeks.

KLARNA offers flexible payment plans with zero interest and zero fees. You can spread out the cost of your purchase over 4 equal payments, with the first payment due at the time of checkout. With KLARNA.
AFFIRM is another payment plan option that offers monthly payments with low-interest rates. You can select your payment plan at checkout.

settings.caption: *Payment options through Affirm Canada Holdings Ltd. (“Affirm”). Your rate will be 0-31.99% APR (where available and subject to provincial regulatory limitations). APR offered is based on creditworthiness and subject to an eligibility check. Not all customers will be eligible for 0% APR. Payment options depend on your purchase amount, may vary by merchant, and may not be available in all provinces/territories. Actual payment option terms will be shown at checkout. A down payment (or a payment due today) may be required. Affirm accepts debit cards and PAD as forms of repayment on payment options. Select payment options may be eligible for repayment in the form of credit cards. Please review the terms and conditions of your credit card when using it as a form of repayment. Sample payment options may be: a $800 purchase could be split into 12 monthly payments of $72.21 at 15% APR, or 4 interest-free payments of $200 every 2 weeks. For more information, please see https://www.affirm.com/en-ca/how-it-works.
